subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, seizing upon a potential marketing coup, acquired Lance Broadway, a 25-year-old right-handed starting pitcher, for catcher Ramon Castro in a trade with the Chicago White Sox late Friday.
snippet: The Mets, seizing upon a potential marketing coup, acquired Lance Broadway, a 25-year-old right-handed starting pitcher, for catcher Ramon Castro in a trade with the Chicago White Sox late Friday.
